metadata.title: CVE-2018-10932 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: lldptool version 1.0.1 and older can print a raw, unsanitized attackercontrolled buffer when mngAddr information is displayed. This may allow anattacker to inject shell control characters into the buffer and impact thebehavior of the terminal.

criterions.comment: lldpad: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
